msv-bg-color.description: Background color is used for page and module background such as buybox, carousel, cart etc.

msv-accent-brand-color.description: Brand accent is the accent color used to represent the brand. Its typically used on primary buttons.

msv-accent-brand-alt-color.friendlyName: Brand accent alt on hover state
msv-accent-brand-alt-color.description: Brand accent alt is the color used to represent the brand on hover state. Its typically used on primary buttons on hover.

msv-accent-secondary-btn.description: Secondary button on hover state. Its typically used on secondary buttons on hover.

msv-font-primary-color.description: Text default is the default color used for text.

msv-font-secondary-color.description: Text accent is the accent color for text used in combination with brand accent.

msv-error-color.description: Error color is used for error states.

msv-success-color.description: Success color is used for success states.

msv-modal-bg-color.description: Modal background is used for modals as background color.

msv-modal-font-color.description: Modal text is used as the color for text on the modals.
